location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire to Francis Rawdon Hastings, Marquess of Hastings, Governor General in Council, Fort William, Calcutta

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage, which has resulted in a small hole in the fabric of the folio. In consequence, the address of the letter has been partially obscured.

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Governor General of bills issued by the Resident to supply the Pay Department for British forces at Bassidore [Bāsaʻīdū].
